casebody.data:
Karyn WILSON and Thomas Baumgardner, Individually, and Walter L. Hart, IV, Guardian Ad Litem for B.B., a Minor
v.
ASHLEY WOMEN'S CENTER, P.A., George Daniel Jacobs, M.D., and Nancy Kuney, CNM No. 178P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 George S. Tolley, III, Attorney at Law, Charles G. Monnett, III, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Wilson, Karyn, et al. John H. Beyer, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Jonathan E. Hall, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Ashley Women's Center, P.A., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 16th of June 2017 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
